name: web-development-project
description: - Chỉ push code lên branch `develop` ## Refs - API tham khảo: `https://furniture-api.fly.dev/#api-endpoints` - Figma: `https://www.figma.com/design/gixsabCBgccjd2B8afw0a7/eCommerce-Website-%7C-Web-Page-Design-%7C-UI-KIT-%7C-Interior-Landing-Page-(Community)?node-id=0-1&p=f&t=twMyE89MLEiXLEg3-0` ## Front-end ### 1. scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:client" "npm run start:server" "npm run start:payment"
